lore: These large yet graceful artillery pieces glide to battle on anti-grav engines, mounting huge guns that utilise a variety of technologies. Shadow weavers fire nets of monofilament wires that shred vulnerable foes. Vibro cannons project crushing sonic waves, while the blasts of D-cannons cause physical matter to collapse in upon itself.

faction: Artillery Barrage: In your Shooting phase
select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE untis) that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn
while this unit is on the battlefield
that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed
each time a model in that unit makes an attack

otherAbilities.This model is equipped with:: shadow weaver; shuriken catapult; close combat weapon.
